00041   String Event::to_str() {
00042     string dstr;
00043 
00044     dstr = "Event: type=";
00045     if (type == CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED)
00046       dstr += "CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED";
00047     else if (type == DISCONNECT)
00048       dstr += "DISCONNECT";
00049     else if (type == MESSAGE) {
00050       dstr += "MESSAGE";
00051       dstr += (String)" version=" + (int)header.version;
00052       dstr += (String)" total_len=" + (int)header.total_len;
00053       dstr += (String)" header_len=" + (int)header.header_len;
00054       dstr += (String)" header_checksum=" + (int)header.header_checksum;
00055       dstr += (String)" flags=" + (int)header.flags;
00056       dstr += (String)" id=" + (int)header.id;
00057       dstr += (String)" gid=" + (int)header.gid;
00058       dstr += (String)" timeout_ms=" + (int)header.timeout_ms;
00059       dstr += (String)" payload_checksum=" + (int)header.payload_checksum;
00060       dstr += (String)" command=" + (int)header.command;
00061     }
00062     else if (type == TIMER)
00063       dstr += "TIMER";
00064     else if (type == ERROR)
00065       dstr += "ERROR";
00066     else
00067       dstr += (int)type;
00068 
00069     if (error != Error::OK)
00070       dstr += (String)" \"" + Error::get_text(error) + "\"";
00071 
00072     if (type != TIMER) {
00073       dstr += " from=";
00074       dstr += addr.format();
00075     }
00076 
00077     return dstr;
00078   }
00079 
00080 }
